item.title: OMD: a Markdown parser in OCaml
item.author: Philippe Wang
item.description:
this is only a test (it'll be deleted soon)

<span class='k'>module</span> Meta <span class='o'>:</span> Meta <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='k'>struct</span>
 <span class='k'>let</span> title <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='s'>"this is only a test (it'll be deleted soon)"</span>
 <span class='k'>let</span> id <span class='k'>=</span> <span class='s'>"pw374.github.io--2013-09-06-15-56-12--4361"</span>

<span class='k'>end</span>
<span class='k'>include</span> Meta
